title: 求助，幸运方块1.7.10如何添加附属？

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

*ORIGINAL LUCKY BLOCK MOD REQUIRED!

1) Install the original Lucky Block mod and play at least 1 time
2) Close Minecraft
3) Delete original LuckyBlockProperties.txt from .minecraft\config\lucky
4) Put the LuckyBlockProperties.txt (from this zip folder) in .minecraft\config\lucky
5) Go in .minecraft\mods and open the lucky block mod's .jar file
6) After you opened it, go in mod\lucky\files and replace the original LuckyBlockProperties.txt with LuckyBlockProperties.txt from this zip folder
7) After that fo in \assets\lucky\textures\blocks and replace the original lucky_block.png with lucky_block.png from this zip folder
8) Close everything and play :)
emm
帮翻一下67条

世予予 发表于 2020-2-20 11:20
附属mod直接丢在mods文件夹里呀
额按照他的步骤，是不是原版的幸运方块就被替换掉了？
